title: (x) Amoda logo scifi sans - Neuropol {Lex}
content:
hey, I was wondering if anyone knew what the 2 fontfaces used in this logo are. I am doing a project for my type design class where we are making a brochure, and this is the company i am doing the brochure of, but the only logo i can find is pretty lo res.

thanks a bunch!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154210im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/header_4727.gif)

 [‹ "The Saturday review of Literature" unidentified Caslon Swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29295 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "der hörverlag" italic humanistic sans - Ocean Sans {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29326 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wolfattack

comments.content:
[Neuropol](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154210/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/neuropol-x/ex-bold/) by [Ray Larabie](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154210/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Ray%252BLarabie) and what looks like [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154210/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Helvetica).

- Lex
awesome, thanks a bunch Lex, i really appreciate it. Yeah, i was pretty sure the bottom was helvetica, i just wassnt sure about the top.
